title: aliveNFT
author: aliveNFT
content: Hello, dear forum membersWhat do I propose to fix for your project:- Constant monitoring of chats, social pages, forums, branches, as well as post information- Creating banners (design) and posting, daily, maintaining the target audience in the asset.- Ideas and implementation of marketing moves on a minimum budget (test mode is also possible)- Conducting, organizing events online, offline is not important. (It also includes work on bitcointalk.org )- Weekly (monthly) reports on the results and, if necessary, a report in Google Meet / Zoom- Support for players in Ru/En languages (C1+)About me:I have been a crypto enthusiast since the end of 16, have a good understanding of the cryptocurrency market, and knowledge of effective devirsification.At the moment I am in Asia and I am ready to work on any schedule up to 6 days a week if the work is really stable.- My online from 7 hours a day.Detailed DM information or leave your contacts in the reply to this post, I will contact you in a few hours.Note:I will not work in dark schemes or meme tokens, exchanges that have opened to earn and will close. I will do a deep drawing on the product before working.
